content: description the racing summer tank uses a simple v_stitch for beautiful texture and a comfy stretch it features a racerback style on the back and thin spaghetti straps toss it on in the summer heat or wear it under a cardigan in the colder months this pattern is free on my blog 1 grab this pattern as a lion brand kit 2 you get all the yarn you need to make your tank top + the pdf digital download of the pattern you can even choose your yarn color i have a full video tutorial 3 of the racing summer tank be sure to check it out and subscribe 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/racing-summer-tank-crochet-pattern/ 2 http //shrsl com/3kzut 3 https //youtu be/t6dwqnauiaa
